texts: Neurosenorary communication will be established only when I become your.
First you need to spend a little coins.
I will tell you all that I know! But when I find myself in the wallet ...
The more expensive I am, the stronger the connection!
Now is the best time for this!
There will be no better time!
#name#, I wish you to be generous! Including feelings!
#name#, I wish you that your current investment brings you dozens of X!
